member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.Mobile.Server.StorageData
member.summary: An abstract implementation of the interface required by as well as an implementation of required by Azure Table Storage. It provides a default mapping from the properties including partition key, row key, and timestamp into the corresponding properties on .

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Mobile.Server.StorageData.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Mobile.Server.StorageData.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a given and .
member.param: The partition key of the to be initialized.
The row key of the to be initialized.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Mobile.Server.StorageData.Id
member.summary: The id is composed by combining the and the using a instance which serializes the partition key and row key as a comma separated tuple of values. By setting this property, the partition key and row key will also get updated. As such the id property itself is not mapped to the actual storage table as it strictly contains the same information provided by the partition key and row key.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Mobile.Server.StorageData.Version
member.summary: The version is a representation of the property which is maintained by the Azure storage SDK. The etag represents the version of this entity as obtained from the server and by setting this property the etag is also updated. As for the id property, this property is not mapped to the actual storage table as its information is provided in the etag.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Mobile.Server.StorageData.UpdatedAt
member.summary: This property timestamp at which the entity was created. By setting this property, the property is updated as well. The property is not mapped to the actual storage table as the information is maintained by the timestamp property.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Mobile.Server.StorageData.Deleted
member.summary: Indicates whether this entity has been marked for deletion.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.Mobile.ServiceLogCategories
member.summary: Category names traced by the service infrastructure. By separating it out from the default Web API categories and from other user categories it is possible to filter them out in the tracing logic.

member.name: M:System.StringExtensions.SplitAndTrim(System.String,System.Char[])
member.summary: Splits a string into segments based on a given . The segments are trimmed and empty segments are removed.
member.param: An array of Unicode characters that delimit the substrings in this instance, an empty array that contains no delimiters, or null.
